sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNFILEDETAIL SET ATCH_FILE_ID = #afterFileId# , FILE_SN = #afterFileSn# WHERE 1 = 1 AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #beforeFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD('ã„´', LVL*4, ' ') || A.DOC_NM AS DOC_LVL , A.DOC_NM , A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD FROM (SELECT * FROM PRJ3000 WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND USE_CD = '01') A WHERE 1=1 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID START WITH A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORD ASC

sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ3001 WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DOC_ID = #docId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.*, ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.CNG_INF_ID , A.INF_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00023', A.INF_TYPE, '1') AS INF_TYPE_NM , A.FILE_SN , A.FILE_STRE_COURS , A.STRE_FILE_NM , A.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , A.FILE_EXTSN , A.FILE_TYPE , A.FILE_SIZE , A.RJT_RES , TO_CHAR(A.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS SIGN_DTM , A.SIGN_USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , B.USR_NM , ROWNUM FROM PRJ3001 A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON (A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MODIFY_USR_ID = B.USR_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FILE_SN = #fileSn# ORDER BY A.MODIFY_DTM DESC ) T WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1
